item.title: mary add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "For you, a thousand times over" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: mary add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It may be unfair, but what happens in a few days, sometimes even a single day, can change the course of a whole lifetime..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: mary add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: mary add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There is only one sin. and that is theft... when you tell a lie, you steal someones right to the truth." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: mary add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Men are easy,' he said, fingers tapping on his mahogany desk. 'A man's plumbing is like his mind: simple, very few surprises. You ladies, on the other hand...well, God put a lot of thought into making you." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: mary add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "We stayed huddled that way until the early hours of the morning. The shootings and explosions had lasted less than an hour, but they had frightened us badly, because none of us had ever heard gunshots in the streets. They were foreign sounds to us then. The generation of Afghan children whose ears would know nothing but the sounds of bombs and gunfire was not yet born..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "All endings are also beginnings. We just don't know it at the time." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Accept who you are; and revel in it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Death ends a life, not a relationship." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Sometimes when you sacrifice something precious, you're not really losing it. You're just passing it on to someone else." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "No life is a waste," the Blue Man said. "The only time we waste is the time we spend thinking we're alone." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "You have peace," the old woman said, "when you make it with yourself." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Strangers are just family you have yet to come to know." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Each affects the other, and the other affects the next, and the world is full of stories, but the stories are all one." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Without love we all like birds with broken wings." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "One day can bend your life." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "So many people walk around with a meaningless life. They seem half-asleep, even when they're busy doing things they think are important. This is because they're chasing the wrong things. The way you get meaning into your life is to devote yourself to loving others, devote yourself to your community around you, and devote yourself to creating something that gives you purpose and meaning." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "I like myself better when I'm with you." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "People often belittle the place where they were born." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Scenery without solace is meaningless." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Death doesn't just take someone, it misses someone else, and in the small distance between being taken and being missed, lives are changed." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "It is no coincidence that the words 'trying' and 'dying' are only a few letters apart." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Holding anger is a poison...It eats you from inside...We think that by hating someone we hurt them...But hatred is a curved blade...and the harm we do to others...we also do to ourselves." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "People say they 'find' love, as if it were an object hidden by a rock. But love takes many forms, and it is never the same for any man and woman. What people find then is a certain love. And [he] found a certain love with [her], a grateful love, a deep but quiet love, one that he knew, above all else, was irreplaceable." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Love like rain, can nourish from above, drenching couples with soaking joy. But sometimes, under the angry heat of life, love dries on the surface and must nourish from below, tending to its roots, keeping itself alive." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Lost love is still love. It takes a different form, that's all. You can't see their smile or bring them food or tousle their hair or move them around a dance floor. But when those senses weaken another heightens. Memory. Memory becomes your partner. You nurture it. You hold it. You dance with it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: mary add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "I thought about all the people I knew who spent many of their waking hours feeling sorry for themselves. How useful it would be to put a daily limit on self-pity. Just a few tearful minutes, then on with the day." -- Mitch Albom
